short_summary: Providing Subject Matter Expertise for the APEC SME-WG, running research, and organizing conferences.
description: The tender is for a 3-year project to provide expertise and research to support the Canadian government's participation in the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises Working Group (SME-WG).
duration_in_months: The tender is for a project duration of 3 years.
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement - TSPS - Subject Matter Expert(s) Senior

**Solicitation Number:** 23-226726
**Publication Date:** June 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 5, 2023 14:00:00

## Project Overview

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) seeks a qualified Canadian expert or organization to provide subject matter expertise for the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises (SME) Working Group.

## Term and Conditions

The project will run for three years, with the contractor expected to:

* Establish a network of Canadian researchers and experts in various specializations related to SMEs.
* Conduct a research program and produce economic analysis on topics relevant to SMEs.
* Connect with international partners to identify and develop links with experts and researchers in other APEC economies, international organizations, or elsewhere.
* Organize a minimum of two, two-day conferences in Canada during the project period.
* Write a summary report at the end of each conference.

## Evaluation Criteria

The contractor will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price.

## Related Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Contracting Entity

This procurement is conducted by the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD), which is located in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.
